creator: graham@ham1.co.uk
text:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open any test plan
2. Hit save n times
3. n backups are made

This is pretty bad because a useful backup could easily drop off the list, especially for people who have a habit of pressing ctrl+s multiple times in a row.

Tested on current trunk with ant run_gui
